english.title: If They Got Me Thinking
text: I swear, if they got me thinking
in my heart and eyes there isn't another love
she is my life and my life long dream
she is all my tales and she's my destiny...
and in a night they soaked me with love
she made me sleepless with her words and the delicacy
of her greeting deprived me from sleep
I swear, if they got me thinking
in my heart and eyes there isn't another love
she is my life and my life long dream
she is all my tales and she's my destiny...
I was sleepless in your awayness
and I wait to see you and touch
your palms and kiss your eyes
I swear, if they got me thinking
in my heart and eyes there isn't another love
she is my life and my life long dream
she is all my tales and she's my destiny...
my love, my life long dream
and even if you ask for my eyes
I love you, I love you, I love you
I swear, if they got me thinking
in my heart and eyes there isn't another love

english.title: Lessa btes2ali
text: you'll find the answer in you
when you run through my veins
when you are all my sorrow
when i live my dream with you
what are you for me after all that?
and you remain the sweetest thing left for me
when i always stays up at night for you
with your fantom,so what's all of this for?
when i challenge the world for your sake
when i suffer from your sorrows
when i devote for you while in your place
when i find out that missing is my company
and the nostalgia for you is getting on me
and when my heart takes a beat
of nostalgia and tenderness and gentlness
and i find my soul chasing for you
and when i live dreaming of a world
you're its light (the world)in every second
in which i'm not with you ,what is it worth?
in which i'm not with you ,what will it worth?
when a second passes by me
and you're not in front of my eyes
why is it hard and tough?
didn't i tell you my eyes
it's hard that you aren't worth it
you're my dreams and my univers
oh my madness and my missing
beside my heart that's scared on him
beside my heart that's scared on him
when i forget my life before you
and i get born when i meet you
and love is written on it
and whatever i say to you
is the sweetest dream i've ever had
you're my heart and my eyes
and you're my soul and the ligh of my years
what do you want me to tell you more ?
what do you want me to tell you more ?

arabic.title: أحلى ذكريات
text: في كل ليلة عيوني شيفاك واديا
انا عمري يوم ما اقدر انساك
يا حبيبي انا ليك مشتاق بناديك
كل اللي فيا بيحلم بيك وبحبك
خلاص ح موت من اللهفة عليك
انا راجع لعنيك عذبت روحي وسبتك
ده انا كنت عايش في العذاب
في كل ليلة عيوني شيفاك واديا
انا عمري يوم ما اقدر انساك
يا حبيبي انا ليك مشتاق بناديك
كل اللي فيا بيحلم بيك وبحبك
خلاص ح موت من اللهفة عليك
انا راجع لعنيك عذبت روحي وسبتك
ده انا كنت عايش في العذاب
في كل ليلة عيوني شيفاك واديا
انا عمري يوم ما اقدر انساك
يا حبيبي انا ليك مشتاق بناديك
كل اللي فيا بيحلم بيك وبحبك
خلاص ح موت من اللهفة عليك
انا راجع لعنيك عذبت روحي وسبتك
في كل ليلة عيوني شيفاك واديا
يا حبيبي انا ليك مشتاق بناديك
كل اللي فيا بيحلم بيك وبحبك
خلاص ح موت من اللهفة عليك
انا راجع لعنيك عذبت روحي وسبتك
في كل ليلة عيوني شيفاك واديا

english.title: The Best Memories
text: I think of the best memories
I pretend as if I didn't live alone
And I live with you all the time
I feel your soul with me
Not a single second is out of my sight
I am completely with you and I live for your love
In every night I see you and melt in your touch
My entire life I could never forget you
And every time I remember you
My love, I love you, and I miss you
Every night I dream of you, and I love you, and I need you
My soul is tortured when you leave me
Please, please come back to me again
I am completely with you and I live for your love
In every night I see you and melt in your touch
My entire life I could never forget you
And every time I remember you
My love, I love you, and I miss you
Every night I dream of you, and I love you, and I need you
My soul is tortured when you leave me

arabic.title: ألبوم صور
text: و فى كل عين ليه دمعتين
و احضن ايديك و انا بحرسك
و نعيش سوا من غير صور
و انده عليك و احضن هواك
من غير ما ادور ع الصور
و مفيش امل و لا يوم جديد
و انا هعمل ايه و انت بعيد

english.title: Photo album
text: My life just pass in a moment & the memories are just a photo album
In this photo the moon laughed ..when we met in travelling
I saw you unhappy ..there are tears in each eye!
Years passed by on this photo , I wish we can change the images
Why do I draw you from the photos ..they speak to me & I speak to you ?
I just want you to understand , love is not a photo album !
My soul is with you ..making you company , I miss you ..I want to touch you
I wish to hug your hands while guarding you , and we live together with no photos
I wish I could dream with you , when I live with you there .
I call you ,and hug your love …without searching for photos
For lots of times , I said I am not happy ..there is no hope …no new day
What can I do while you are so far , life is lost in the photos
انا نفسى مره افهمك ... الحب مش البوم صور
و احضن ايديك و انا بحرسك .... و نعيش سوا من غير صور
love is not a photo album

english.title: The Hands Were Stretched Out
text: The tears of our eyes slipped away
And time froze between two lovers
I didn't ask her "What should we do?"
Nor did she tell me where we would go
Woe is me and good riddance
that is not fitting for the wounds
or even our dream that slipped away
that is not fitting for our tale
It's as though it was all a silk thread
that we've cut from the start
On the ground there's two shadows
Two wounded [lovers] standing side by side
It's as though they are two branches
Oh my heart, open your doors
to the wind and to the pain
are to end up as strangers..

english.title: Ezzay
text: How, and my baby in my heart and her love on my mind?
My heart says her words all the time.
I'm breathing her passion all the time.
Every word I say she has to say it back to me.
And if she tried one time to keep quiet, her eyes speak.
And whoever tries to understand our words, they will know what's between us.
If we separated once, my soul will make me closer to her.
And if I agreed to one day, lovers, my heart will speak of him.
And I forget who is sitting next to me, and I speak of her.
It shows I melted in my lover.
It shows when I touch her when I meet her.
I miss her and I put up with her being away.
I miss her when she's standing next to me.
Oh world, is there like this?

english.title: The Beautiful Dream
text: And our home went empty on us
And loneliness burns like a fire
The one who used to wipe
our tears with her hands is gone
We used to throw our pains away
in her embrace, but now she's gone
The dream of the years melted away
And my heart is full with a hundred wounds
Ever since that day, the flavor of life
She used to stand by our side back then
She used to feel the flames of our pain
She used to soothe our hearts to make us withstand
If we were stranded or lost
Not even a thousand screams of pain would help
Not even a thousand tears of regret would help
This farewell is set in stone
And what can we do... What can we do?
This is our fate and destiny
We are destined to be broken by our sadness

english.title: El 7ilm El Gameel
text: The beautiful dream... the small home
All has lost... all has gone
All was broken down... all has changed
The pople who were wiping our tears with their hands are gone
The pople who we were telling them our pains are gone
And in my heart, a hundren of Ah (my heart is full of pain)
SInce that day, life tastes sour
They were our lovers, who feels the fire of our hurt
consolse our heart... for the life
EIther if we lost or missed our way, eyes used to get us back
and hearts used to listen to us when we say Ah... ah
and the house bacame empty, and lonliness is like fire
The pople who were wiping our tears with their hands are gone
The pople who we were telling them our pains are gone
not even a thousand pain scream, nor a thousan tear of regret
Time for separation is settled, and what can we do...
This is our destiny and our predestinations are full of sadness that breaks us down
Oh God, give us patience... for what we are going through

arabic.title: المفروض
text: المفروض ان احنا الاتنين كان بينا

english.title: it was supposed
text: It was supposed that we had wishes and promises for both of us
That we both frequently said there is no limits can separate us
Why did you tell me that you love me
Why do you deceive me why do you cheat
Why do you love as you will leave?
Why do we dream as we will lose this dream?
Why do you swear to me and promise me
why do you get close to me and make me get used to you
And force me and tie me to a love that has no base or existence
Why do you deceive me and why you delude me and why do you let me be fooled
I filled your life with love and happiness and you filled my life with injuries and tears
You made me live in delusion for years
In a journey of love, passion and desire
Why were your eyes so faithless
Where have your heart and your awareness been
Why do you give me life then why do you kill me
Why do you build me then why do you destroy me
Why did you grip me and why did you make me walk with you in a blocked way
Why is always the good heart rewarded with pains and deception
Why must the true love be ended with separation and leaving
Tell me what have I done for your heart
I didn't aggrieve so why do you
Why do you leave me in fire and suffering?
Why do you break me and you conquer me
And you hurt me and you divide me
And you force me and oblige me to promise and you don't keep your promises

arabic.title: انت السبب
text: وآدي اللي نابك م الهوى آدي اللي نابك
ويسألوك يا قلبي ليه ترضى بعذابك
تقول نصيبي واعمل ايه في اللي انكتب
انك حتفرح بالهوى يا دوب يومين
وتعبتنا مع قلب عمره ما كان لنا
ولا فات لنا غير بس اصعب ذكريات
مع كل ده حنيت يا قلبي للي كان
وندهتله وكان أي شيء ما كان

english.title: u r the cause
text: u r the cause .. u r the cause
u r the cause my heart, my heart
u adore to stay awake at night .. u adore to get tired .. u adore to say my lovers ,my heart
and u opened ur door to the love .. u opened ur door
and this is what u get from the love .. this is what u get
and they ask u why ur satisfied with ur agony
u say it's my fate and what can i do to what's written?
and i told u so many times ,my heart i told u
the most bitter wound is that of the lovers
and i sweared to u so many times, my heart i sweared
that u'll enjoy the love just 2 days
and u opposed me and u didn't listen to my words
and u came back complaining to me about the multitude of pains
and u opened ur door to the love .. u opened ur door
and this is what u get from the love .. this is what u get
and they ask u why ur satisfied with ur agony
u say it's my fate and what can i do to what's written?
and u r the cause u r the cause u r the cause my heart, my heart
u gave us , my heart .. why u gave us?
to eyes that took us and melted us in pains
and u tired us out with a heart that has never been ours
and it didn't leave to us but the hardest memories
and with all this u " my heart " longed for what's been
and u called him as there's nothing has been
and u opened ur door to the love .. u opened ur door
and this is what u get from the love .. this is what u get
and they ask u why ur satisfied with ur agony
u say it's my fate and what can i do to what's written?
and u r the cause u r the cause u r the cause my heart, my heart

english.title: Do you love him..
text: the same way you used to love me?
I mean, do you miss him in the same way you used to miss me?
And just like you used to wish for me you now wish for him
Just like you used to wait for me now you wait for him
I mean, are the things between the two of you the same as they were between you and I?
Tell me before the tears begin to cover my eyes
Tell me in what ways you think of him and if you stay up all night for him
So everything that was mine he has taken it, why?
You gave him your passion and feelings and faithfulness just like that
No and if you say you think of me then you are playing him
So the things that are between the two of you are they the same as they were between you and I?
Tell me before the tears begin to cover my eyes

arabic.title: بكل العمر
text: لا شاف مني عذاب ولا آه

english.title: With All my Life
text: With all my life, I loved her
I hid her in my heart's embrace
In the name of love, I called her
my darling, my world and my joy
Turns out that love was my fault
And my heart was to blame
I kept giving her my love
but it turns out I was only helping her to hurt me
Live on and learn, my heart
Live on and learn, my heart
Turns out that I deserve this
I am so full of regret
I gave her my tenderness so easily
And I never let her suffer
She never suffered or felt pain with me
Nor did my love ever make her cry
She took my soul and my whole life away
And took more than she could have ever dreamed of
took more than she could have ever dreamed of
It's a shame to have lost all this life
chasing an illusion that I believed in
I followed my heart and did what it said
And found myself alone on my path
I wish I had never wished to have her
I wish I had never surrendered to her love
She took my soul and my whole life away

arabic.title: تخسرى
text: وان كل الدنيا لو باعت هوايا
اللى باع حبى انا انساه فى ليلة
كنتى فاكرة انى فى بعادك حضيع

english.title: You Lose
text: I won't lose much by being on my own
You, on the other hand, will lose
away from my love and from my path
I've bet on you my whole sweet life
I've bet that you wouldn't go away
That it would be impossible for you to go away
And that if the entire world sold my love out
You alone would stand by my side till the end
You will lose my true love
away from my love and from my path
away from my love and from my path
Staying away from you is not impossible
The one who sells love out is someone I can forget in a night
You will lose my true love
away from my love and from my path
away from my love and from my path

english.title: Gar7y Ana
text: And tonight I will put out the candles from the stranger's wound
My wound that I have lived from the separation of my most precious love
A candle for the tears.. a candle for pain
A candle for the tenderness.. a candle for regret
Come closer my heart toward the candles
And the wound and the sadness are my guests
And flowers were invited but surprisingly one seed would awaken my fears
Ohh from the passion my heart's matter
It wasn't in your hand it was fate
That means that's it, it was predestined
Let the distance stay my lover
Seconds are left and the night is over for the first celebration of my wound
And the wound will live on inside of me
It is impossible for memories to die
Or for it to be stolen away someday
The memory will have a voice with every single candle I blow out

english.title: Habibi Hayati
text: My life that's coming, I'm going to spend it with you
My life that has already passed was for you
My heart was waiting for you
My eyes are asking for you
How when I am in your arms
My heart becomes tender, full of emotion
I see you through my eyes as an angel
And I melt in your love
I dream and I dream with you of our days together

arabic.title: دعوة فرح
text: جتلك احدد حب عمري ايه مصيره
جتلك وسايب بين ايديكي خط سيره
جتلك عشان ابدا معاك من جديد
جتلك اعيش واحلم بعمر يكون سعيد
انا لما شفتك قلبي طار من لهفتي
جبت السنين في شريط حزين متجمعة
دعوة فرح وفيها اسمك جنب اسمه
بردت ايديا وضاع خيال حلمي اللي راسمه
مبقيتش عارف الاقي صوتي والم جرحي
طب جيتي ليه؟ وقصدك ايه من اللقى؟
جيتي عشان ترميني في حضن الشقى

english.title: wedding invitation
text: I came to you here , just at the time
I came to you to end the separation
I came to you to determine the fate of my lovelife
I came to you , leaving it's Itinerary ( my life's ride ) between your hands
I came to you , to have a new start with you
I came to you , to live and dream for my life to be happy
you came with a slow step
you came with a sweet smile
you came just in the time like you said , at the specified minute
when I saw you my heart flyed from it's yearning
I ran to you , with my yearning Preceded my step
I brought the years all in a sad tape
and I stood with my eyes afraid and teared
and I found your hand in your purse getting out a ...
a wedding invitation , a wedding invitation
a wedding invitation with your name next to his name
my hands was cold as the imagined dream I drawn ( drew ) was lost
the surprise , th fear and the pain
they 've lived in my features ( facial features ) . I couldn't find my voice or the pain of my hurt
Is it possible for the wedding times to replace pain
Is it possible that the wedding years ends with Penitence ( regrets )
then why did you come , what did you mean by meeting ( the date they organised to meet )
you came to thraw me in the arms of Misery
congratulations for your wedding and for my misery
Isn't that your dream , okay , come on , go away

arabic.title: ذكرياتنا
text: ذكرياتنا يا ذكرياتنا يا كل يوم مر في حياتنا
ذكرياتنا يا ذكرياتنا يا كل يوم مر في حياتنا
يوم بيحكي اللي حصل واللي هيجرى
يوم بحلوه ومره برضو احلي ذكري
يوم بيحكي اللي حصل واللي هيجرى
يوم بحلوه ومره برضو احلي ذكري
يبقا مين فرق ما بينا انهاردة
يبقا مين فرق ما بينا انهاردة
انت فاكر اول مرة عنينا اتقابلو اول مرة قلوبنا تحس
اول مرة نقول بعنينا كلام بين قلبي وقلبك بس
انت فاكر اول مرة عنينا اتقابلو اول مرة قلوبنا تحس
اول مرة نقول بعنينا كلام بين قلبي وقلبك بس
انتي فاكرة اول مرة اقولك احبك
شوفت الفرحة في ورد خدودك رعشه ايدك فرحة قلبك
انتي فاكرة اول مرة اقولك احبك
شوفت الفرحة في ورد خدودك رعشه ايدك فرحة قلبك
قولي ايه اللي حصل ايه ايه اللي جرا
واللي غيرنا كدة ايه ايه يا تري
قولي ايه اللي حصل ايه ايه اللي جرا
واللي غيرنا كدة ايه ايه يا تري
ليه بننسى الحب في لحظه غضب
ليه نبيع بالرخص ايام من دهب
ليه بننسى الحب في لحظه غضب
ليه نبيع بالرخص ايام من دهب
ليه تملي نقول دي قسمة ونصيب انكتب
ليه تملي نقول دي قسمة ونصيب انكتب
‏(أ​م) عايز تقول انك فاكرني (ه​﻿ ​ش) هو مين قالك نسيتك
‏(أ​م) يعني قلبك مش بايعني (ه​﻿ ​ش) بعت عندي واشتريتك
‏(أ​م) عايز تقول انك فاكرني (ه​﻿ ​ش) هو مين قالك نسيتك
‏(أ​م) يعني قلبك مش بايعني (ه​﻿ ​ش) بعت عندي واشتريتك
لو شكا في يوم قلبي منك قوله اصبر
قوله حبة في قلبك يوم عن يوم بيكبر
لو شكا في يوم قلبي منك قوليله اصبر
قوليله حبة في قلبك يوم عن يوم بيكبر
لو هقولك مره تانية اني هحبط ابقي قول للقلب وحياتك ما تهبط
لو هقولك مره تانية اني هحبط ابقي قول للقلب وحياتك ما تهبط

english.title: Our memories
text: Our memories, oh, our memories, oh, every day of our lives
Our memories, oh, our memories, oh, every day of our lives
A day that tells what's happened and what's going to happen
A day of sweetness and bitterness, I remember
A day that tells what's happened and what's going to happen
A day of sweetness and bitterness, I remember
My memories and your memories are one
So, what is the difference between us today?
My memories and your memories are one
So, what is the difference between us today?
You remember the first time we met, the first time you were moved by passion
The first time we only spoke words between my heart and your heart
You remember the first time we met, the first time you were moved by passion
The first time we only spoke words between my heart and your heart
You reemeber the first time I said I love you
You showed joy in the roses of your cheeks, the quiver of your hands, the joy of your heart/soul
And today it was like both Eids together
You reemeber the first time I said I love you
You showed joy in the roses of your cheeks, the quiver of your hands, the joy of your heart/soul
And today it was like both Eids together
Today it was like both Eids together
Tell me, what happened, what happened?
And what changed us, what, what do you see?
Tell me, what happened, what happened?
And what changed us, what, what do you see?
Why did I forget the love in a moment of passion?
Why did we give up all that we had?
Why did I forget the love in a moment of passion?
Why did we give up all that we had?
Why do you tell me this is fate that is meant to be?
Why do you tell me this is fate that is meant to be?
(AM) You're saying that you remember me? (HS) Who told you that I forgot you?
(AM) You mean your heart is not affected? (HS) I sold it and bought you!
(AM) You're saying that you remember me? (HS) Who told you that I forgot you?
(AM) You mean your heart is not affected? (HS) I sold it and bought you!
If it complained, then tell it to be patient
It was saying a love was growing day by day
If it complained, then tell it to be patient
It was saying a love was growing day by day
If I tell you that I'm falling (for you), keep telling your heart and you will fall (for me) too
If I tell you that I'm falling (for you), keep telling your heart and you will fall (for me) too
Welcome, my love, to my heart
Welcome to the security I vow to you
Welcome, my love, to my heart
Welcome to the security I vow to you
Welcome, my love, to my heart
Welcome to the security I vow to you
Welcome, my love, to my heart
Welcome to the security I vow to you
Welcome, my love, to my heart
Welcome to the security I vow to you
Our memories, our memories, our memories

arabic.title: ذكرياتي
text: أنسى أيه و لاأيه ولا أيه
أنسى قلبى لما جيت دقيت عليه
أنسى أيه و لاأيه ولا أيه
أنسى أجمل حلم عشته ودبت فيه
أنسى أيه و لاأيه ولا أيه
انسى جرحى اللى أنت مش فاكره ناسيك
أنسى أيه و لاأيه ولا أيه
أنسى عمرى اللى ضاع ومش لاقيه

english.title: my memories
text: my memories are taking me here and there from my life
my memories are still alive they still hold my pain through my breaths
every word you promised ,every dream we had
i still remember it oh baby i still remember it ,i didn't forget it
what should i forget in particular?shall i forget my heart
you broke it from it's prison and it's silence and you started to fill his life
till he loved you and you're love became all my life
what shall i forget ,shall i forget the most beautiful dream i had and in wich i melted
every night i count your words and remember your passion and love
a dream that came closer to the truth but it got lost in the end of the road
when your heart went to someone else but me ,he left me to my suffering and my destiney
i die every night and i make my heart live in his deep pain
what shall i forget ,shall i forget my life that got lost and i'm disable to find it
i wish to teach my heart how to forgt ,i wish it can hate and forget for one day
but no,i can't forget that my heart was innocent

english.title: MY MOMROIES
text: my momroies is falowing and taking me from my way and my life
my momroies still living still hiding in my breath my life
every promise you promise me every dream we dreamed togther
i still remmber it aha baby i still reammber it i didn't forget it (x2)
forget what and what forget my heart when you came nocking to it
forget what and what forget my heart when you chame nocking to it
you took him from his jail and his pease
and you start filling his life (x2)
till he start loving you and your love beacome everything

and left me with my turcher and thinking about what's wirten for me (x2)
every night i die and i live my heart with his pain is drwan
forget what and what forget my life that got lost and i can't find it
forget what and what forget my life that got lost and i can't find it
i wish i can teach my heart how to forget
i wish i can teach my heart how to hate and to be hard
but no i wont forget that my heart was a victum
forget what and what forget my heart when you came nocking to it

english.title: Resala Min Alb Engara7
text: For a crying heart, crying and hurt
Open it, have sympathy for it.
The words of a heart in love.
The cuts she made are living the heart.
I lost my love in her hands.
The letters that I wrote are my tears.
And you are a heroine in my story.
There is hate, there is cruelty, in my journey.
After the last word to you, I hated it.
And the story, that's it, with your hand, scribble it out.
And what was between me and you is over.

arabic.title: سبتينى ليه
text: فيها ايه لو كنتى عشتى العمر جنبى؟
فيها ايه لو كنتى عشتى فى حضن قلبى؟

english.title: Sebteny Leh
text: why are the mornings such torture
after you left my life is painful
no candles and no good times
what's so wrong with you living your life with me
what's so wrong if you lived in the hold of my heart
and being silent just won't do
and my arms are lifting a load that they can't bear
its impossible after we lived together
its impossible for love to be lost in an instance
you had called me your life, your life
said you would be with me for years
why did you change your promise?
why did you change your promise?
Its impossible after all this love
its impossible for it to end like this
who will my heart beat for?

english.title: A MISTAKE
text: a mistake and i regret it iam telling you hear me
you don't own my heart and it's not a toy you play with it
a mistake and i regret it iam telling you hear me
you don't own my heart and it's not a toy you play with it
i made you feel safe and i gave you love
and so many things long time ago you couldn't understand it
i made you feel safe and i gave you love
and so many things long time ago you couldn't understand it
you lost the fear of my heart you lost it even though it was honest with you
your the one how is wirting the end of our love
even with the big love i wont be a prosnier for you
you don't have dreams in my heart you can continue with me
even with the big love i wont be a prosnier for you
you don't have dreams in my heart you can continue with me
you lost the fear of my heart you lost it even though it was honest with you
your the one how is wirting the end of our love

you don't own my heart or a toy to play with it
a mistake i regret it iam telling you hear me
you don't own my heart or a toy to play with it

english.title: draw me close to you
text: Hany Shaker - Draw Me Close to You
Why does time pass so fast
I was telling you one thousand hundred million I love yous
You made me feel like I could compensate for all that has passed in my life
You made me see my days as more beautiful
I don't say days and revoke them
I do not fear that which is come as long as I am with you
I don't want to live my life unless it's with you
Days were passing as years while you were far
I don't know after you, my darling, who I will live for?
What do I hope for when I am in your hands?
Take me to your to put me in a world that I love

english.title: My Heart is Yours
text: And even if you're far, I see you
And if you sigh in pain, I sigh twice
And even if you're happy or sad
It found safety by your side
And even if our path is long
you deserve all the years of my life, darling
I don't care about anything as long as I'm with you
As long as you see me

كان ضي فجر ما جاش في وقته

your heart used to own my feelings and your heart has never been for me

and i woke up to find tow seas of tears that waters a love you've never cherish

and i found the nostalgia of my heartthat melted saying "i wish i haven't seen him

why did you promise me the love while there is someone in yor heart

english.title: Everyone who knew you
text: Honestly , Everyone who knew you can not believe you can be a Traitor
I am telling them with love , he did not Betray , he went to love
I am like them , I think betraying does not suit you ..it will break you
You do not belong to traitors road
If you did not do mistakes , come & say I am innocent
Doubt filled us while you are away
If you are in love , go on & live your life
Stay there & do not come yearning for your memories
Your love is here or there ? , it is not clear
Your heart is there or here , the name is traitor
I am like them , I think betraying does not suit you ..it will break you
You do not belong to traitors road
If you did not do mistakes , come & say I am innocent
Doubt filled us while you are away

every night is a feast to my heart

as long as your heart is near mine,
the most beautiful thing in this life is my love
how lucky my heart that he has you

as long as your heart is near mine,

i tell your heart a lots of sweet words

and that you are my night and my moonlight

arabic.title: كلمتين
text: جاية أقولك أيوة آسفة اني سيبتك
انسى اللي كان دا أنا مهما كان برضه حبيبتك
جاية أقولك أيوة آسفة اني سيبتك
انسى اللي كان دا أنا مهما كان برضه حبيبتك
مش هما دول الكلمتين اللي انت جاية وحتقوليهم
وفي آخرهم دمعتين على كل خد حترسميهم
مش هما دول الكلمتين اللي انت جاية وحتقوليهم

اللي باعني في يوم حبيعه وببلاش

english.title: Two Words
text: Reaching out my hands to you
I can't bear a day away from you
The place for your heart in my embrace
I'm coming to tell you yes I'm sorry that I left you
From now on no matter what I am your darling
These aren't those two words that you will come and say to me
And after you will draw two tears on each cheek
You took my heart down from a high point to the lowest earth
You gave me a thorn and took a rose from me
No more I love you, not me
I am lost and will never see you again with me
I won't forget who once hurt my heart
The one who sold me out I will sell for free
I will prove to you that my heart still lives after you

text: مش حقدر أمشي وكمل سكة ندم

text: i'll go and leave you ..you were widhing for me..pegging for me...i won't come back to you
i was your lover..you were my life..no matter how much you call me..i won't hear you
kont 7abebak kont 7ayaty mahma nadetny mesh ha3m3lak

i was your lover..you were my life..no matter how much you call me..i won't hear you
you speak abnormally the moment you come beside me
you cry tears, and you say you love me
you barely had me ,you started to fool me
you got me lost bit by bit with your hands
you speak abnormally the moment you come beside me
you cry tears, and you say you love me
you barely had me ,you started to fool me
you got me lost bit by bit with your hands
i was the safety inside you in the moment of sorrow i was your cure
and when the hear melted in you passion,you hurted me oh you did
i wanted to be joyful for one day..and live with you in the heaven
and i found pain in every day i waited for
i wait and say i'll stand but you sorrow took so long
i won't be able to walk and persue in silence of regret

and i found pain in every day i waited for

text: وأنا بنهار وأنا بنهار وأنا بنهار

english.title: "if you're in love.."
text: if you truly are in love
you'd have stood agaist the wind
you'd have not left my heart broken
in the middle of the fire
if your heart were still innocent
how could you misjudge an innocent
and leave my heart drawning alone
you'd have learned to be scared for your love
you'd have not hesistated not even for seconds
not to forget me in just a mintue
if you've loved me you would've not been able to
break my heart thats loving you much
even though i put up with you torturing me
even though i waited with tears on your door steps
my destiny is to live tortured by you
i've taken more than i can take
i felt you are not for me
its a really big shock to me
my feeling of your betrayal was so awful
if you ever loved me you'd have made me laugh
you'd have not caused me pain
you'd have not killed my feelings
you woud have had mercy on me when i was weak
you'd have stood by my side
when i was crumbling when i was crumbling when i was crumbling

arabic.title: لو قالولك
text: لو قالولك مين يروح للموت عشانك
لو قالولك مين يبيع لو ساب مكانك
لو قالولك مين حبيبك يا حبيبى

english.title: If they asked you
text: If they asked you, who would die for you
If they asked you, who would get lost if he left your place
If they asked you, who's your lover?
Go ahead, everything you like to say, say it
Go ahead, you'll never regret for what you'll say
I sacrifice my spirit for you
I worry about you more than myself
You are my soul, oh my soul, I'm dreaming of you, my soul
if you can feel my love and stay here with me
You are my soul, oh my soul
I wish i could satisfy you, my soul
say I stay and I'll come for you

english.title: Law 2aloolak
text: If they asked you who would die for you, tell them me.
If they asked you who sold if they touched your place, tell them me.
If they asked you who is your love, tell them me.
Go ahead, everything you wish to say, say it.
Go ahead, you will never regret what you'll say.
I'm always for you, and my soul is for you.
I'm afraid for you more than myself.
Go, oh soul, I'm dreaming of you my soul.
Me, that's enough for you to feel my love and stay with me here.
Go, my soul, I wish I could make you happy my soul.
But you, keep dreaming and say you'll wait (for me), and I'll come for you.
Go ahead, everything you wish to say, say it.
Go ahead, you will never regret what you'll say.
I'm always for you, and my soul is for you.
I'm afraid for you more than myself.
If they asked you who would die for you, tell them me.
If they asked you who sold if they touched your place, tell them me.
If they asked you who is your love, tell them me.

english.title: Mat Hadedish
text: Don't threaten my heart which loved you
If you were a sea ,i'm the cloud
If you were a letter , i'm the book
If you are able to not coming back
The sun of tomorrow is not your eyes
Tomorrow with you or without you
Be my heart's light and it's shadow
Be the sun ,and don't move away
Your love is not the end
You are just a part of the story
Yes i entered you to my life
But i can forget you and to live

arabic.title: محتاجلك يا عمري
text: محتاجلك يا أحلى نجمة ويا احلى قمر
محتاجلك يا طير طاير فى السما سواح
محتاجلك تيجينى قوام لاجل يوم أرتاح
محتاجلك تملي حياتي عقود فل وورود
محتاجلك تبقي فى حياتى تبقي انتى الربيع
يملانى حب وحنان وشوق يكفي الجميع

english.title: Mehtaglek
text: i need u, my life, to feel safe
i need u, my life, that will come and which has gone
i need u, u r the sun of light and warmness
i need u in the world of fear and roughness
i need u in the darkness of the drowned night
i need u, u r the medicine and u r the doctor
i need u to make the universe brightness and light
to plant for u a day and to cross for u seas
i need u, u r the most beautiful one in all people and human kind
i need u, u r the most beautiful star and the most beautiful moon
i need u, u r a bird that is flying freely in the sky
i need u to come to me immediately, to relax for a day
i need u to fill my life with necklaces of jasmine and roses
i need u to fill it with unlimited happiness
i need u to be in my life, to be the spring
to fill me with love, sympathy and passion that would be enough for all

arabic.title: مش حب وبس
text: كل ثانيه كل لحظه عشنا فيها
نفسي اقولك يا حبيبي ايه بيجرى

english.title: Mush hob wa bas
text: It's not just love, it's impossible
for me to feel this way with another
There are things in my heart stronger than
I can express in simple words of love
When you touch me with your hands, when you hug me with your eyes
I feel as though I am completely yours
Every beat in my heart, every gaze of my eyes
Every word atop my lips, baby, call to you
It's not just love, it's not just love
I wish I could find a stronger word than "I love you"
A word that can fully describe my feelings
I wish to tell you what I feel when you're near me
Regardless of how I explain to you what's inside me
It's difficult to describe my love for you
Every second, every moment we've lived
I wish to tell you, dear, what goes on
I shall not live, but for you

arabic.title: مشتريكى
text: وارجعى ما تضيعيش عشرة العمر فى ثوانى
واسمعينى ما تسمعيشى مهما قالك حد تانى
مين عليكى قلبى باقى الا انا
حضن دافى فين تلاقى غير هنا
ما انتى جربتى فراقى كام سنه
والهوى يحرم عليا بعد منك مهما غيبتى
كل طير مهما طال بيه السفر له وليف يرجع اليه
كل ليل مهما طال بيه السهر له نهار يطلع عليه
و انتى فين ياللى بتعاندى القدر انتى فين

english.title: i want u
text: I want u don't leave (lit. i buy u don't sell me)
Come back don't lose our life together in seconds
And get satisfied with ur destiny and live
listen to me don't listen to whatever other says
Who will care about u rather than me
U won't find a warm hug except here
U've tried my separation many years
What's wrong with u .. what's wrong with u
And what remains is for u
I won't love again after u no matter how long will u be away
The seconds, the minutes, the hours
The nights, the hopes and the memories
All of them are kept awake beside me calling u
Listen to their beats and u will remember what has gone
Each bird no matter how long has it travelled has a companion that it will come back to
Each night no matter how long it is has a day that will end it
And where r u, u who resist the fate, where r u
Isn't it enough, what do u want

english.title: With you
text: I melt and stay up the night.1
I am lost in another world.
I fill the new world with ...
Oh, love of my whole life 2
I want to tell you my story,
And cry out to the whole universe and say...
I see it in a different way3
I find all what is lost4
I find myself and my place
And our road is filled with flowers
My groans melt in the night
Every night all the stars sing for me
Every time i see you, my love

arabic.title: معقول نتقابل تانى
text: أرجوكي ما تبصيش كده في عيني

english.title: Is It Possible We'd Meet Again?
text: Is it possible we'd meet again?
Is it possible you haven't forgotten me?
Is it possible, oh is it possible?
I found you here standing before me
That's too much for me, oh life
Oh please wait a bit more for me
Please don't look in my eyes this way
Meet me gently and a bit by bit
I didn't count on a coincidence to happen
Nor did I anticipate the torture of longing
My eyes see you and they are scared
that you might be a fantasy and just wishes
Could it be that we are standing there greeting each other
as though we have just met
passion has been in pain between us
I opened up with my heart to you
And ever since then I closed it on you
And no one else could take your place
Here's my heart, take it with your hands

arabic.title: نسيانك صعب اكيد
text: لكن طول ما انت فى بالي

english.title: certainly..it is very hard to forget you
text: certainly. it is very hard to forget you
Start my life all over again
Will not give me back my time
That is increasing by your love
But as long as you are in my mind
Your image will always be in my imagination
certainly. it is very hard to forget you
لكن طول ما انت فى بالي
Is a hard thing to handle (affored)
I relieved you, so why did you ?
Why did you hurt me with love ?
a lover while you are cheating ?
You sold it without a price
The first time your heart betrayed
You did it to who gave you the safety
May be …I will forget the regretness
Will not give me back my time
That is increasing by your love
But as long as you are in my mind
Your image will always be in my imagination
certainly. it is very hard to forget you

arabic.title: هو أنا أنسى
text: هو أنا أنسى ... هو أنا أنسى؟

english.title: Howa ana ansa
text: ah ah i can't forget when you came and hurted me ,when your heart trampled me when he sold me(betrayed me) and was injust to me and your love was lost in front of my eyes
can i forget ? can i ?can i?can i forget all my life that you took or my heart that you deceived or my flames or the torture that i lived and saw with you
are you coming again to say (shared: i don't get it) isn't it enough ?shame on you i was living in your hands why did you hurt me?
my heart was with you,was tender ,was an angel ,i was wishing your satisfaction why did you lost me?
you're coming afer what?do i have anything left ,you won't find what went away
no my heart,don't blame ,we see many tortures from him ,it was a hard way and mirage in wich we fell down for many years

english.title: I FORGET
text: ahaahaahaa do i forget do i forget
when you came and hurt me when you heart step on me
when you heart petray me and hurt me
and petray my love air infront off my eyes
do i forget do i forget
my hole life that you took
or my heart wichs you tricked
or the fire and torcher that i lived with you and saw it with you
do i forget do i forget (x2)
your coming again saying you want to buy me bake
that's enoug feel sorry for me
i was living between you arms
when my heart was with you was good and nice with you was an angel
i was wishing to please you
you coming bake after what there's nothing left in me
what's gone you wont find it
you mean i wont be me
we saw from her so much torcher
the way we are walking in it has no hope in it
we got lost in it for years (x2)

english.title: You're with me
text: When you're with me, in my arms, I forget my world I forget my time
Get closer, closer, and take me, you're in my arms and still missing you.
Your looks are pure and innocent
They make me wonder, is that a dream or truth? Are you really for me?
Oh how I wanted you so
My soul was following you and the heart lived inside of you
Love and nostalgia waited so long
Come closer let me melt in your love and enjoy the time
Are you really for me? are my hands touching yours?
in this world, no one like you
Oh how I wanted you so
My soul was following you and the heart lived inside of you
Love and nostalgia waited so long
Come closer let me melt in your love and enjoy the time

arabic.title: يا ريتني
text: ما كنش امل في حياتي اتهد
ما كنش الدمع جرح لي الخد
ما كنش امل في حياتي اتهد
ما كنش الدمع جرح لي الخد
ما كنش امل في حياتي اتهد
ما كنش الدمع جرح لي الخد
انا بندم على ايامي اللي انا عشتها على كل سنين
انا بندم على احلامي اللي حلمتها مع ناس ثانيين
لو كان قلبك معايا لو كان هواك هوايا
كنت حبيع الدنيا بحالها وحبك كان كفايه
ما كنش امل في حياتي اتهد
ما كنش الدمع جرح لي الخد
مش عارف انا من غيرك كنت حكمل عمري ازاي
مش عارف انا ونا جنبك ليه مش خايف من اللي جاي
لو كان عمري بإيديه لو كان يرجع شويه
كان لا زمان ولا وقوة حتبعد ايدك عن ايديه

english.title: I WISH
text: i wish i met you before i met anyone
i wish our way will beacome longer
i wish i knew you long time ago long time ago
there wasn't no hope will went down
there wasn't going to be tears on my checks
i wasn't going to know sadness
the days wasn't going to pass this fast
my heart wasn't going to say aha
i found you you found me
you loved me i loved you
i regret the days that i lived with my years
i regret the dreams that i dreamed with someone else (x2)
if your heart was with me
if your love was my love (x2)
i am going to betray the hole world and your love is enough for me
the days wan't going to pass this fast
my heart wasn't going to say aha
i found you you found me
you loved me i loved you
i don't know without you how i was going to finish my life
i don't know why when iam beside you i don't sacre of what coming (x2)
if my life was in my hands
i wont leave your hands for a minte
the days wan't going to pass this fast
my heart wasn't going to say aha
i found you you found me
you loved me i loved you

arabic.title: يا قلبي لا
text: مش هو ده يا قلبي لا
مش ده اللى كان معنى الحياه

english.title: no my heart
text: This is not it, my heart
This is not the meaning of life
All my hope and happiness was it
Never in my life have I forgot it for a second
It went and left me in a different road
Drowning in night and tears and ahhh
This is not it, my heart
This is not the meaning of life
Was I in a dream or imagining things, my heart
How did it deceive you and take my love with it
Was it the happiness of our life or something else?
How did we finish the road? (how did we end our love story)
And how, my heart, did it take the love away?
My heart, the flower of love wilted in my path
Don't make me travel a journey even if it was for real
And its enough that we lived our life...and something
Thats what took its suffering and its worries away
And its hurts from beginning to end

arabic.title: ياريتك معايا
text: ياريتك معايا يا حبيبي يا ريتك معايا
وياريتنا نكون سوى انا وانت والهوى
ونلف الدنيا ديا يا عيني ومعانا الهوى
بيعز علي أفرح من غير ما نكون سوى
قلت حبي ضاع يا عمري في الليالي
خوفي يا خوفي من عيون الناس
أبدا ما انساك ده حبيبي هواك
ونلف الدنيا ديا يا عيني ومعانا الهوى
بيعز علي أفرح من غير ما نكون سوى
ســألوني الناس قلت بحبك سألوني الناس
ولموني الناس قلت بحبك ولموني الناس
ولا لوم بنسيني حبك ولا يوم بفرح إلا جنبك
آه يا حبيبي آه لو جيت
ونلف الدنيا ديا يا عيني ومعانا الهوى
بيعز علي أفرح من غير ما نكون سوى

english.title: I wish you were with me
text: I wish you were with me, my love, I wish you were with me
And I wish we were together, me and you and love
And we'd go around this world, my eyes, and love accompanies us
It's too much for me to be happy without us being together
Today my life asked me what happened?
I said our love got lost, my life, in the nights
My fear, O my fear from the eyes of the people
My fear, O my fear that the people take you
Take you from my hands, O my fear
Never do I forget you, indeed my love
And we'd go around this world, my eyes, and love accompanies us
It's too much for me to be happy without us being together
People asked me, I said I love, the people asked me
And the people blamed me, I said I love you, the people blamed me.
And no blame makes me forget your love, and never do I feel joy except beside you
Oh my love, Oh if you came
To your love, and returned, I wish
And we'd go around this world, my eyes, and love accompanies us
It's too much for me to be happy without us being together
